report.title: NPMS All Visits 5
report.description: Display a list of visits suitable for adminstrators to view all data. New version of report will display users even if there is a problem in users or people table, these users have name displayed in orange.
report.query: SELECT distinct #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN users u on u.id=csf.created_by_id LEFT JOIN people p on p.id=u.person_id JOIN locations plot ON plot.id = csf.location_id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms cache_ttPlotType on cache_ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id JOIN locations square ON square.id = plot.parent_id AND square.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users_websites accesscheck on accesscheck.website_id=csf.website_id AND accesscheck.user_id=#auth_user_id# AND accesscheck.site_role_id<3 WHERE #website_filter# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND csf.training = false #order_by#

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Filter results to a particular location id Currently used by Plant Portal for limiting results when detecting if a plot has samples associated with it.

column.name: plot_name
column.sql: COALESCE( '' || 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' || '', csf.location_name, csnf.public_entered_sref)

column.name: first_name
column.sql: CASE WHEN p.id is NULL OR u.id IS NULL THEN '' || p.first_name || '' ELSE p.first_name END

column.name: surname
column.sql: CASE WHEN p.id is NULL OR u.id IS NULL THEN '' || p.surname || '' ELSE p.surname END

column.name: email_address
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE p.email_address END

column.name: survey_number
column.sql: case when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NOT NULL AND (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer != 0) THEN 'Survey 2' when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NULL OR (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer = 0) THEN 'Survey 1' ELSE '' END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
